data.title: Udaipur Artist Festival
data.shortDescription:
Udaipur Artist Festival

 

Hillusion in collaboration with Cityscope is organizing a 2-day (13th-14th August) carnival for the first edition of Udaipur Art Festival. An enthralling culmination of art, music, stand-up, poetry, good food, experiences, engrossing workshops and to top it all off, a vibrant flea market.

 

We firmly believe in an artist's ability to express their creativity through any medium of their choice. We do not describe your art form, your own expression of it does! This is what renders us different from the others.

 

Firm believers in the age-old adage of universal love, we extend our heartfelt support to all the artists, musicians, and the creative community, and in exchange, we ask you to help us set up a stage where everyone can freely share their talents with an enthusiastic audience!

 

This is UAF (Udaipur artist festival) for you in a nutshell! Artists from everywhere are welcome.

 

To give you an idea of the space, we will have two stages set up for presenters willing to showcase their skills; which will be ranging from standup comedy, live music, folk music, and DJ-ing to theatre, storytelling, and poetry, et al.

 

If that isn't exciting enough, we have a colorful flea market, and tattoo artists, at the venue. Come explore all the vibrant wares and create a core memory with us at UAF!

 

Peace ☮️ 

Mark your calendars and stay tuned for updates.

 

Bookings for General Public

Click on the book now button on the bottom of your screen.

 

Bookings for Artists

You can register as an artist by using the link given below.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1q5PHIIw3qSHzJhFd7I7bz30HPMw3WRpfxefTbfwkCsE/edit

 
 

FAQs

 

Q. What is ULF?

Udaipur Art Festival is a two-day carnival of art, music, stand-up, poetry, good food, enthralling experiences, engaging workshops and to top it all off, a vibrant flea market.

 

Q. Is safe parking space available at ULF?

Yes, there is safe parking space available at ULF.

 

Q. How to register?

For general registrations, you can tap on book now to purchase the tickets.

 

Q. What is the cost for general registration?

The cost for early bird general registration is 600/- INR. This rate will go up in the next stage of registrations.

 

Q. Are there any arrangements for accommodation?

Accommodation will be provided on inquiry but is subject to availability. Artists will be given priority.

 

Q. How to register as an artist?

You can register as an artist using the link given below.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1q5PHIIw3qSHzJhFd7I7bz30HPMw3WRpfxefTbfwkCsE/edit

 

Q. Can we bring our booze/food?

No, why would you need it anyway when you'll have amazing food to feast on?

 
 

For further queries, feel free to write to us at:

hello@analog.ventures

data.title: Urban Desi - Stand Up Comedy Show
data.shortDescription:
Go on a laughter ride with on of Jaipur's best - Karan Hooda performing live

 

If you're looking for a break from the usual evenings, look no further than a stand up comedy show - Urban Desi.

Karan Hooda has been bringing laughter to audiences in our city for years, and we're thrilled to announce that the show is happening.

Don't miss this opportunity to see one of the Jaipur's best comedian perform live on stage. We promise it will be worth your time.

data.title: Learn The Art Of Meenakari
data.shortDescription:
Learn Meenakari art, from house of Padmashree Kudrat Singh ji of Jaipur. The art is loosing its touch and we want people to learn this art and sustain it. The course will consist of seven (7) weekly classes and each class will have 3-4 hours of hands-on learning the art.

 

Bonus - Take your Meenakari creation as a souvenir!!!

data.title: Half and Half Live Stand-Up Comedy Show
data.shortDescription: Book your tickets now! We have two of our own stand up comedians from Jaipur coming to take you to a laughter ride, and they're pretty amazing. We can't wait to see you there!

data.title: Blue Pottery - The Set in Stone Art
data.shortDescription:
The Luxury of blue pottery is in its indigenous designs and the intricate carving done on it that gives it a distinctive appearance, which reflects the traditional craftsman culture of Jaipur.
Experience the art, emotion and culture of the legendary Blue Pottery with locals. This is a one-of-a-kind experience that gives you a chance to create your own piece of authentic blue pottery. Indulge in Blue Pottery from the heart of India with our local masters from Saini community. With CityScope you will get a chance to not just try but also make your own pot from the master himself!

In this Experience you will
1. Learn the history of Blue Pottery from master potter
2. Learn and understand the process of crafting 
3. Create your own Blue Pottery and take it with yourself as a souvenir.

data.title: Free Nature Walk and Nature Craft Workshop
data.shortDescription: Itra Garden is organising an eco-walk educating the adults & children about living sustainably with nature. Get together with friends and family at 7:00 AM - 8:00 AM  on 12th June 2022 at Smriti Van and explore ways to have a greener lifestyle by taking part in various activities led by an expert.

data.title: Off Road To Thrill
data.shortDescription:
Get off the tarmac and experience an all new level of adrenaline pumping through your body. The track starts as cement, changes to tarmac, gradually black soil, red soil and finally loose sand to gradually bring out the Pro in you. The uphill climbs, sharp corners, deep hollows will surely test your driving skills. 
So break the monotony and experience the thrill, choose the vehicle of your choice from any of the ATV, Race Buggy, Polaris Off Roader or Off Road Go Kart and go on a crazy ride. 

 

Inclusions
1. Protective gears
2. Supervision of track marshalls
3. Access to vehicle of choice

data.title: Go All Out..Go Paintball
data.shortDescription:
Experience the thrill of playing Paintball with your gang. Paintball is an exceptional game which tests your mental prowess, physical toughness, tactical shrewdness and marksmanship to the limits. Join the game to bond and increase team cohesion with fun and adrenaline pumping experience.

Rates
1. 50 Bullets - Rs. 499/Per Person
2. 100 Bullets - Rs. 799/Per Person
3. 150 Bullets - Rs. 1199/Per Person

data.title: Leopard Sighting and Photography Safari
data.shortDescription:
Leopards are one of the most ferocious wild cats, sighting them and capturing pictures of them in their natural habitat will make anyone's heart pump. CityScope provides an experience that allows entusiast and wildlife lovers to come close to these magnificent cats. With probability of more than 90% sighting a leopard, it is nearly guaranteed that you would sight one, along with enjoying the beauty of the forest and other wild inhabitants like Blue Bulls, Spotted Deer, Gray langur, Rhesus Macaque, Small Indian Mongoose, Ruddy Mongoose, Bengal Monitor, Desert Gerbils, Striped Hyena, Desert Fox, Porcupine, Hedgehog, and Sambar Deer.

 

Free Cancellation

 

Booking Accepted for Minimum Group of 4 People.

 

Summer Timings

5:30 Am to 8:00 Am and 4:45 Pm to 7:15 Pm

 

Winter Timings

6:45 Am to 7:15 Am and 3:45 Pm to 6:15 Pm.

data.title: Fun & Activities With Elephants
data.shortDescription:
You’ve seen so many beautiful pictures of elephants through various websites. Now you want to spend close time with these animals, and experience how it feels being around elephants. Well if you are in Jaipur, we know a wonderful place where you can ride, feed, paint, walk, ride, wash and many more incredible experiences with elephants. We are here to make your day memorable with a wonderful time spent with elephants nearby Amber Fort. 

 

Inclusions:

Elephant guide & wildlife storyteller

Food to feed Elephants

Organic colours to paint

Huge elephants pool to bath with them or shower them

Mineral water bottle

 

Please note transfers from hotel to start and the endpoint is not included in the tour cost.

 

Free Cancellation

data.title: Jaisalmer Private Day Tour
data.shortDescription:
Jaisalmer is an ancient city known to have born sometime in the 12th century. The tour will take you through some of the best places in the city - from Gadisar lake, Jaisalmer fort, Nathmal Haveli to Patwon ki haveli. The trip ends at the sunset point in Suli Dungar. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
Private tour

 

Exclusions:
Food and drinks (unless specified)
Transportation to/from places of attraction
Entry/Admission - Jaisalmer Fort
Entry/Admission - Kothari's Patwaon-Ki-Haveli

 

Departure details:
Traveller pickup is offered.
Pick up and drop facility from any hotel in Jaisalmer with extra charges

 

Duration: 
3-4 hours

 

Additional information:                    
Return to the original departure point
Confirmation will be received at the time of booking
Not wheelchair accessible
Service animals allowed
Travellers should have a moderate physical fitness level
This is a private tour/activity

The tour will begin from your hotel/location in Ajmer at 8 am. You get to see the Khatushyam Temple located in a tiny village called Khatushyamji in the Sikar district. Devotees believe that it houses the miraculously rediscovered head of Barbarika or Khatushyam, a character from the Mahabharata. You will also drive to the Salasar Balaji Temple. situated on National Highway 668 in the Churu district.

data.title: Ranthambore Tiger Jeep Safari Tour
data.shortDescription:
The Ranthambore National Park and Tiger Reserve is one of the world’s best-known wilderness territories. It offers a great opportunity to get a glimpse of the majestic Royal Bengal Tiger amidst the hills and lush grasslands. It is easy to spot coy chitals, hyenas, foxes, nilgais, deers, jackals, leopards, marsh crocodiles and birds during 3 hours of jeep safari with a guide. 


All you have to do is arrive at the location and get ready for a fun-filled experience. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Meeting Point: Hammir Circle

 

Inclusion: Transportation, Guide

data.title: Jodhpur In All Its Splendor
data.shortDescription:
As part of this outing, you will get to see some historically enriching places in and around Jodhpur:

 

Mehrangarh Fort

The magnificent Mehrangarh Fort is situated on a small hill in Jodhpur. It was constructed by Rao Jodha, the then chief of the Rathore clan in 1459. The fort has several palaces, galleries, and temples.

 

Umaid Bhavan Palace

The Umaid Bhavan palace was built by Maharaja Umaid Singh in the 20th century. A part of it has now been converted into a hotel and a museum.

 

Jaswant Thada

Jaswant Thada lies adjacent to the Mehrangarh fort. It is a royal cenotaph made of marble and was built to commemorate Maharaja Jaswant Singh. Some rare portraits of the former rulers of Jodhpur are also displayed here.

 

Clock tower market

This is the perfect place to experience the culture of the blue city. Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:

Water Bottle, Tea

 

Exclusions:

Transportation, Tickets, Meal

 

Prices for more than 2 Pax:

3-5 Pax: INR 2500

6-15 Pax: INR 4000

 

No charges are applied for children below 14 years.

 

Fill the group booking form for more than 2 Pax.

data.title: A Walk Around The Blue City
data.shortDescription:
Jodhpur was founded by Rao Jodha in the mid-1400's, and the city is filled with ancient temples, historic palaces and blue houses. In this tour, you will get to see heritage water sites, temples as well as local market spice and textile markets. 

 

The excursion starts from Chandpole and ends at clock tower. You will be picked up and dropped off from your hotel in Jodhpur. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Time Duration: 3 Hrs

 

Inclusions:
Water bottle, Tea, Transportation

For more than 2 Pax prices are:
3-5 Pax in a group - INR 3400
6-12 Pax in a group - INR 7000

 

Fill group booking form for more than 2 Pax

 

Note: It is advisable to wear sports shoes. There will be no charges for children below the age of 10 years.

data.title: A Day With The Artisans Of Jodhpur
data.shortDescription:
The team will pick you up from the hotel or place of stay in Jodhpur city and also brief you about the plan for the day. You will get to meet multiple artisans across villages as part of the excursion. Some of them are as below: 

 

Shepherds Village is a place where you can visit the shepherds and learn about their way of life. 

 

Gudha is the ideal spot to observe wildlife such as antelopes, rabbits, blue bulls and peacocks, and also visit the Bishnoi community. 

 

Kankani is where you will get to witness how people practice the art form of hand block printing on fabrics. 

 

Salawas also known as the weaver's village is the destination of rugs. Artisans  weave them out of cotton or wool. You will get to go to Pukh Raj Durry Udhyog which is one of the most renowned rug manufacturers in the region. 


At Potter's village, you can try your hand at the wonderful art form of pottery. 
You will also get to have some traditional Rajasthani lunch in Salawas before getting back to the hotel in Jodhpur. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Time: 5 Hrs

 

Inclusion:
Transportation, Lunch, Water Bottle

data.title: An Enchanting Camel Safari At Osian
data.shortDescription:
The "Thar" spreads across three prime cities of Rajasthan - Bikaner, Jaisalmer and Jodhpur (Osian). Amidst the endless stretches of sand dunes there is a lot of life including animal and bird species. The experiences includes a campfire, folk music session as well as a camel safari. 

 

You will also get to visit Osian, a small ancient temple within the desert. 

The tour starts at 2 pm with a 65 kilometer jeep drive to Osian. After this, you will be visiting a few villages in the area.
The day ends with a magical sunset and dinner in Jodhpur at 8 pm.

 

Free Cancellation

 

Meeting Time: 2 pm

 

Inclusions:

Transportation (To-fro from Jodhpur City-Osian), Dinner, Water Bottle

data.title: An Adventurous Hike To Eagle Peak
data.shortDescription:
The Eagle peak is situated amidst the Aravali ranges around 80 kilometer away from Udaipur City and is the ideal place to learn the basics of mountaineering. The trek starts from the foothill and involves an ascend with the help of a rope. The view of sunset is mesmerising from the summit. 

 

2 Days & 1 Night

 

Itinerary
Day - 1
• Arrival at the base camp of Eagle peak in the afternoon

• Briefing about the trek with tea and distribution of packed food

• Trek starts at 3.30 pm

• Reach mountain top at 6 pm

• Enjoy Rajasthani dinner, Bonfire and camping at base camp

 

Day - 2
• Wake up in the morning, freshen up and enjoy breakfast  with a lakeside view 
• Departure by 9 am

 

The trek includes: 
- Trekking
- Night stay & camping
- Rappelling activity
- All meals (2 days)
- Medicare
- Technical & safety equipments
- Support team
- Service of certified mountaineers as Instructor

 

You have to carry: 
- Bagpack
- Rain cover for bag & your self
- tourch (mobile torch will not work)
- Good sports shoes
- Extra pair of clothes (lowers & T-shirt only)
- 2 liter water bottle per person
- Hat, cap, sunglasses

 

You will be sent the location and time details. 

 

Please fill the  enquiry form to book the experience on weekdays/group booking.

data.title: Shiva Valley: Trek To A Beautiful Sunset
data.shortDescription:
The summit of Shiva Valley is one of the most beautiful in Rajasthan. Located near Kumbhalgarh, the campsite for the trek is about 4100 feet. 

 

Itinerary
• Short briefing with refreshments at 
Lakhmawaton ka Gurha at 12:00 pm
• Start the trek at 1 pm with some packed lunch 
• After a 5 kilometer trek, reach the campsite at 5 pm
• Evening snacks with a breathtaking view of the sunset
• Bonfire and dinner at 8 pm 
• Wake up at 6 am with tea and snacks 
• Short hike to get an exposure about the historical values of the place.
• Brunch at 10 am
• Descend the peak at 11 am and go for rappelling 
• Reach the starting point by 1 pm

 

The package includes:
- Night stay & camping
- Rappelling activity
- All meals(2 days)
- Medicare
- Technical & safety equipment
- Support Team
- Service of certified mountaineers as instructors

 

Please carry these things: 
- Bag pack
- Rain cover for bag & your self
- Torch
- Good pair of sports shoes
- Extra pair of clothes (lowers & T-shirt only)
- A 2 liter water bottle per person
- Hat, cap and sunglasses

 

You will be sent the location and time details. 

 

Please fill the enquiry form to book the experience on weekdays/group booking.

data.title: Fort To Temple Trek
data.shortDescription:
This is an early morning ride to Kumbhalgarh (80 Kms from Udaipur), the second-largest fortified wall in the world and a UNESCO heritage site. You will meet the guide at the fort and begin the trail to the Kumbhalgarh wildlife sanctuary which is home to a plethora of species - from wild hogs, sloth bears, leopards, antelopes to several bird species. 

 

Distance: 10-13 Kms 

 

Duration: 4 – 5 Hours

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
English speaking trekking guide
1 navigator
Hiking sticks
Jungle entrances
2 water bottles per person
Refreshment, tea, coffee, cookies, peelable fruits
Wet tissue paper
Essential first aid

 

For more than 2 Pax:
3-6 Pax: INR 4000 Per Person
7-10 Pax: INR 2500 Per Person
Above 10 Pax: INR 1500 Per Person

 

Please fill the enquiry  form for group booking

data.title: Walk Along The Aravali Nature Trail
data.shortDescription:
The trek starts in an area that is located in the northwest of Udaipur. Known as Ubeshwar Ji, the place is named after Lord Shiva whose temple is the main attraction here. 

 

The guide will accompany you through the scenic trek which is also a window to the Mewar region. You will walk through trails of the Aravalli mountain ranges and many tiny villages and hamlets. At the halfway mark, there will be time for a short break. The trek culminates at Morwania village from where you can drive back to the hotel.

 

Distance: 10 Kms Approx
 

Duration: 3-4 Hours

 

Free Cancellation 

 

Inclusions:
English speaking trekking guide
1 navigator
1 water bottle per person
Refreshment, tea, coffee, cookies, peelable fruits
Wet tissue paper
Essential first aid

 

For more than 2 Pax:
3-6 Pax: INR 3000 Per Person
7-10 Pax: INR 1800 Per Person
Above 10 Pax: INR 1500 Per Person

 

Please fill in the enquiry form for a group tour.

data.title: Excursion To The Tiger Lake
data.shortDescription:
The journey starts off with a 20 minutes ride to reach the starting point of the trek which is a small village located in an area northwest of Udaipur known by the name Morwania. On arrival, you will meet the guide, who will accompany you on the trek. You will get to witness scenic villages and farmlands. 

 
At the halfway mark, you will stop at a location for refreshments, following which you will arrive at Tiger Lake.  Closer to the end of the trek, there's a 15 minutes uphill climb, but, it's worth it for the view from the top. 

 

Duration: 2-3 Hrs 

 

Distance: 8 Kms Approx

 

Free Cancelllation 

 

Inclusions:
English speaking trekking guide
1 navigator
1 water bottle per person
Refreshment, tea, coffee, cookies, peelable fruits

data.title: Countryside Cycling And Organic Lunch
data.shortDescription:
The ride starts in the city but you will be going to the countryside to enjoy the fresh air and friendly locals. The whole ride is beautiful and you can stop at anytime. Halfway through the journey, you will stop at the scenic Tiger Lake for refreshments. Scenic villages and rural farmlands are common on the tour. The journey ends at the village chief's house where you can have a delicious, local, Rajasthani lunch.

 

Duration: 3-4 Hours

 

Distance: 25 Kms

data.title: Saas-Bahu temple cycling in Udaipur
data.shortDescription:
The Saas Bahu Temple is an architectural marvel, but today, the 10th-century wonder is in ruins. Commonly known as the Nagda temple, it is dedicated to Lord Vishnu. The journey to this place will not only give you an opportunity to cherish the beauty of the Aravalli mountain ranges but also treasure rural life and lush green agricultural lands. 

 

Duration: 3-4 Hrs

 

Distance: 30 Kms

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
Mountain Bikes ( Scott / Schwinn / Bianchi)

data.title: Rustic Biking Tour In Udaipur
data.shortDescription:
A mix of uphill and downhill terrains, the exciting bike ride passes through the city before arriving at Lake Pichola. There is a quick pitstop at a village with a view of the Ram temple where you will also see scores of farmlands and learn about the crops grown there. You will also get to experience the tranquillity of Tiger Lake which was built in the 17th century. The tour ends near Fateh Sagar lake, where you can click pictures and spend the rest of the day. 

 

Duration: 3-4 Hrs

 

Distance: 30 Kms

 

Free Cancellation

 

Mountain Bikes ( Scott / Schwinn / Bianchi)

data.title: Cycling Around Blue Waters
data.shortDescription:
The cycling tour will begin at a chosen location where the cycling guide will deliver a briefing of the tour. Later, you will be given the option to choose your preferred cycle and kick off the expedition.


The first ride covers a distance of 2 kilometres to reach Lake “Fateh Sagar”. After a short stop here, you will continue and pass by some refreshing and spectacular views until you reach the old city.

 

Distance: 15 Kms

 

Meeting Time: 08:00 AM

 

Free Cancellation

For more than 2 Pax prices are:
3-6  Pax:  INR 1500 Per Person
7-10 Pax: INR 1200 Per Person
Above 10 Pax: INR 1000 Per Person

 

Please fill the enquiry form for group booking

data.title: Learn photography
data.shortDescription: Learn Photography

data.title: Amber Beyond The Palace
data.shortDescription:
This cycling tour is a leisure activity that will take you through a well-researched, documented and curated trail. You can take a break at all the historic sites including the local temple in Amber. This is the ideal activity for beginner and novice cyclists. However, even the experienced ones will get to spend a nice time out in the open with family and friends.

 

The tour enables you to explore the lesser-known secrets of the Amber citadel and shop at charming spots across hidden streets. You can either take a cab to the starting point or book a transfer with the team. 

 

Please Note:
Please wear comfortable shoes to enjoy this activity.
Do carry your own rain gear(jacket/ windcheater) in case of overcast conditions.
Sunglasses are recommended, clothing should be modest.
"Waiver for Liability" has to be signed by all guests at the beginning of the tour.
 
Inclusions:
Bottled Mineral Water
Geared Bicycles (Cannondale/Firefox or similar)
Quality Helmets
Support Staff with Bike Spares following the group through the ride(Above 6 pax)
Breakfast
Qualified Tour Guide with International experience in conducting cycling tours (Number of guides as per group size)
Free pickup from Central Jaipur

 

Exclusions:
Drop Off, Monument Tickets, Tips

 

3-6  Pax:  INR 1500 Per Person
7-10 Pax: INR 1200 Per Person
Above 10 Pax: INR 1000 Per Person

 

Fill the enquiry form for more than 2 Pax.

data.title: The Best Of Udaipur In Half A Day
data.shortDescription:
This half-day excursion will take you through the history and architecture of one of the biggest palaces in Asia which was built by the 24 Maharanas of Mewar. 

Like other rulers, the Maharanas of Mewar too lived their life luxuriously. The Crystal Gallery stands testament to this. It houses the most unique collections of crystal articles set up during the region of Maharana Sajjan Singh, right from cruet sets, sofas to beds. 

 

You will also get to visit the Jagmandir temple situated on an island in Lake Pichola.

Finally, you can drop over at Sahelio Ki Bari, a beautiful 18th century garden with flowers and fountains. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

INR 4500 Up to 4 Pax

 

Inclusions:
Guide, Water Bottle, Breakfast

 

Exclusions:
Tickets, Transportation

data.title: Classic Guided Safari Tour To Jawai
data.shortDescription:
The leopard safari at Jawai Dam in Rajasthan involves a gypsy ride across tough terrains and mountainous regions. Besides being able to admire the flora and fauna through the journey, you'll be able to capture the movements of leopards and also interact with indigenous folk living there. 

 

INR 16500 Up to 2 Pax

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
Guesthouse (Dbl/ Twin bedded)

Accommodation with one breakfast and dinner.
Transportation from Udaipur to Jawai
Gypsy/Jeep Safari

data.title: Explore the essence of Indian villages
data.shortDescription: test 02

data.title: test 01
data.shortDescription: test 01

data.title: A Walk Through The Legacy Of Udaipur
data.shortDescription:
This exclusive guided walking tour will take you through historical temples and ghats in the city of Udaipur. The experience in itself is known to be enriching 

since it involves observing people and their traditions, interesting localities as well as a slew of vibrant bazaars.

 

As part of the tour, you will visit Laal Ghat, Gangor Ghat, Bagore Ki Haveli, Ganesh Gati, Clock Tower, Miniature Art School Paintings and Kasaro ki pol. 

 

Free Cancellation


Inclusions:
Guide, Milk Tea, Local Breakfast

data.title: This is a test for cover image
data.shortDescription: This is a test.

data.title: Explore The Essence Of Indian Villages
data.shortDescription:
Since most people tend to visit major Indian cities while travelling, they miss out the heart of the country - its villages.  

 

This experience attempts to showcase just that - rural life. The intention here is to benefit local communities economically and socially, break barriers and also lay a bridge for interaction between tourists as well as the local population. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusion:
Transportation, Free Pick-up, Picnic Hamper, Veg. Meal Thali

 

Exclusion:
Tipping Destination-Shopping

 

Note:

Minimum of two persons required to book this experience

data.title: Taste The Flavours Of Mewar
data.shortDescription:
Since Mewar (Udaipur region) is a junction for the rest of the Rajputana state towards the south and for the Malwa and Gujarati region in the west and north direction, it is a place where people from different geographies and backgrounds get together. Hence, Mewar's flavours are both hot and spicy. Dishes like Gatte ki Sabji, Dal-Bati-Churma and the mildly sweet Lehsun Chatni with Khamand-Dhokla are very popular here. 

 

You can relish these local delicacies and smell the raw spices in the market.

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
Guide, One Water Bottle, Buffalo Milk Tea

 

Note: Not more than 5 persons are required in this experience

data.title: Witness The Rich Culture Of Udaipur
data.shortDescription:
Udaipur is known for its beautiful lakes and serene ghats. This experience is curated to enable you to explore the same. You will visit Gangour and Ambrai Ghats, pass through the City Palace and also shop at many handicrafts stores. 

 

A cultural program (Dharohar) involving folk dance performances such as Terah Taali, Majheri and Bhawai will also be organised towards the end at Bagore Ki Haveli. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusion:
Guide, High Tea

 

Exclusion:
Tickets

 

Maximum five persons are required for this excursion.

data.title: A Walk Down The History Of Chittorgarh
data.shortDescription:
Chittorgarh reverberates the passion, bravery and pride of the Rajputana. The Chittorgarh Fort is a UNESCO world heritage site spanning 700 acres of land and consisting of multiple water reservoirs, 65 historic structures, four palaces including Padmini and Rana Kumbha Palace as well as the Vijay Stambha.

 

The Stambha was constructed by the Hindu king Rana Kumbha of Mewar in 1448 to commemorate his victory over the combined armies of Malwa and Gujarat sultanates led by Mahmud Khilji. Similarly, the Kirti Stambh (Tower of Fame) which is also situated within the fort symbolises the ideology of Jains and was dedicated to the first Jain Tirthankara, Sri Adinath. 

 

INR 4500 Up to 3 Pax

 

Free Cancellation


Includes:
Guide, Free Pick-Up, One Waterbottle and Transportation

 

Excludes:
Tickets and Meal

 

Fill the enquiry form if you have more than 3 persons in a group.

data.title: The Mystical Forts And Temples Of Jaipur
data.shortDescription:
You might have heard stories about the several mystical forts and tunnels of Jaipur. But here, you will see all of it. 

 

The Nahargarh Fort offers a full view of the city. During the course of the tour, you can also learn about how water was being conserved by creating channels and stepwells on the hills. From the Jaigarh Fort you will be able to see the famous Jaibaan cannon which is renowned for its size and target distance.

 

Galta Ji is a pilgrimage site of the Vaishnav sect where many devotees come to take a holy bath in its sacred kunds (water tanks). Right above Galta Ji, there is Sun Temple where you can catch a panoramic view of Jaipur. The journey starts at 9:15 in the morning from Hawa Mahal and in the following 8 hours, you will be able to see it all. 

 

Rs. 2850 Up to 5 Pax

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusion:
Guide (Language Proficiency: French, English, Hindi)

 

Exclusion:
Transportation
Tickets
Meal

 

Maximum 12 persons are allowed in this experience

data.title: A Day Out At Kumbhalgarh and Ranakpur
data.shortDescription:
Kumbhalgarh Fort is a 15th-century fort and birthplace of the Great Ruler of Mewar, Maharana Pratap. Located around 85 km from Udaipur, the fort has a long 32 km wall which is built on a hill and has hence survived many attacks from rulers. There is a wildlife sanctuary also situated around the fort. 

 

The Ranakpur Jain temple is contemporary to the Kumbhalgarh fort. The white marble Jain temple occupies an area of 60x62 meters along with a platform based on 1444 pillars.

 

Rs. 4600 Up to 3 Pax

 

Free Cancellation

 

Includes:
Guide, Free Pick-Up, One Waterbottle and Transportation

 

Excludes:
Tickets and Meal

 

Pick-up from the hotel lobby in Udaipur. Contributor (host) will coordinate the pick-up location a day before the experience.

 

Please fill the enquiry form if you have more than 3 people in the group.

data.title: Nathdwara And Eklingji-Nagda In A Day
data.shortDescription:
This excursion is all about ancient temples located around Udaipur. While ShrinathJi Nathdwara and EklingJi are Vaishnav sect's temples, Sahasra Bahu Nagda is a Shaiva's sect temple.

 

You will start off at 7 am to visit Shrinath Ji Nathdwara in the Rajsamand district which is around 45 km from Udaipur. Devotees from across the country are known to visit this marvel. On your return to Udaipur, you will visit both Sahasra Bahu Temple in Nagda Town and Ekling Ji which are 2.5 kilometres apart from each other and almost 22 kilometres from the city. Both these temples are famous for their scenic location and ancient architecture. 

 

A Cityscope contributor who is a recognised, licensed guide from the government will be with you throughout to narrate all the stories and explain the architecture of the temples.

 

Charges: Rs. 4100 up to 3 Pax

 

Free Cancellation

 

Includes:
Guide, Free Pick-Up, One Waterbottle and Transportation

 

Excludes:
Tickets and Meal

 

Pick-up from the hotel lobby in Udaipur. The contributor (host) will coordinate the pick-up location a day before the experience.

 

Please fill the enquiry form if you have more than 3 people in the group.

data.title: In And Around The City Of Lakes
data.shortDescription:
Rightly called the Venice of the East, Udaipur is a dream destination for almost every travel enthusiast. Being one of the most alluring cities of Rajasthan, it is surrounded by lakes and the Aravalli Hills.

 

In this excursion, you will be visiting places like Monsoon Palace, Sahelio ki Bari, Jag Mandir, Lok Kala Mandal, City Palace, Fateh Sagar, Pratap Smarak and Biological Park. 

 

Rs. 3400 up to 3 Pax

 

Meeting Point:

Ticket Window of City Palace, Udaipur

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
Guide, Cab and Water Bottle

 

Exclusions:
Tickets and Meal

 

Fill the enquiry form for more than 3 people in the group.

data.title: Half Day Walking Tour Of Amber
data.shortDescription:
This experience will enable you to get to know the socio-cultural attributes of the  Kacchawa reign in Amber Fort and the nearby regions.

 

There are many ancient Nagar style temples in Amber - Bihari Ji, Jagat Shiromani and Shiva Ji to name a few. The area has heritage waterways and conservative sites such as the Panna Mina Stepwell and Amber Sagar Lake maintained by the Archaeological Department and Development Authority of Jaipur. There is also a mosque called Akbar Mosque which reflects the harmony among different religions.

 

You will be visiting all of these during the excursion.

 

Free Cancellation


Inclusion:
Guide (Language Proficiency: French, English, Hindi)
Water Bottle
Buffalo Milk Tea

 

Exclusion:
Tickets
Transportation 

 

Minimum 2 persons are required for this experience.

data.title: A Tour To Witness The Pride Of Jaipur
data.shortDescription:
Jaipur is one of the best-planned cities in India. It has wide roads and rectangular shaped residential colonies, markets, etc. The huge forts and palaces add to the grace of the city on the whole. 

 

This excursion will be with a senior guide at important monuments like Amber Fort, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, Hawa Mahal & Jal Mahal. The journey starts at 08:15 hours from Hawa Mahal and the following 8 hours, will be spent covering the Amber Fort and other heritage spots. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Rs. 2900 up to 5 Pax

 

Inclusion:
Guide (Language Proficiency: French, English, Hindi)

 

Exclusion:
Transportation
Tickets
Meal


Note:

Maximum 12 persons are allowed in this experience.

data.title: A Photowalk In The Pinkcity
data.shortDescription:
Imagine taking a walk along empty roads in the walled city of Jaipur on a chilly morning. The heritage walk is perfect to experience this. It might just give you the ideal opportunity to capture the heritage and culture of the pink city. As part of the walk, you will get to enjoy the beauty of Chourah Rasta, Tripolia Gate, Badi Choupad, HawaMahal, Sawai Mansingh Library (Old Legislative Assembly of Rajasthan), City Palace and Jantar Mantar. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusion:
Water Bottle

 

Note: 

Minimum 2 persons are required to book the experience.

 

The photo walk starts at 6:00 am between March-October and from 7:00 am between Novembe-March.

 

It is advisable to get a DSLR camera or your mobile phone to capture the scenic spots.

data.title: Jaipur Under The Stars - Cycling Tour
data.shortDescription:
At midnight you will get to reclaim the streets of Jaipur. As beautiful as the city is during the day, it has a quaint charm to it at night. Well, this event is an initiative to invite people from all walks of life for an escapade.

 

Free Cancellation

 

Inclusions:
Bottled Mineral Water
Geared Bicycles (Cannondale/Firefox or similar)
Quality Helmets
Support Staff with Bike Spares following the group through the ride (Above 6 pax).
Qualified Cycling Guide with International experience in conducting cycling tours. (Number of guides as per group size)

data.title: Experience Bagru Prints and Blue Pottery
data.shortDescription:
This day long excursion covers two experiences where you will get to visit sites like Bagru to witness the block prints and the Kot-Jewar village to skim through the Jaipur's blue pottery

 
A film city visit and hi-tea within the premises is also a part of the tour. 

 

Transport can be arranged upon request 

 

Free Cancellation 

 

Inclusion:
Guide, Water Bottle, Hi-Tea

 

Exclusion:

Meal, Transportation

 

Minimum 2 persons are required for this activity.

data.title: Experience bagru prints and blue pottery
data.shortDescription:
This excursion is includes the exploration of two heritage art experiences. Visiting  Bagru to view the block prints and the Kot-Jewar village to witness the famous Jaipur Blue Pottery is not only delightful, but also enriching. 
The trip also includes a stopover at film city.  

 

Inclusion:
Guide, Water Bottle, High Tea

data.title: The Best Of Jaipur On A Cycle
data.shortDescription:
This tour is one of the most interesting ways to explore the ancient culture and architecture of Jaipur. The 3-hour trail starts opposite the Wall Street Hotel at 6 am opposite Wall Street Hotel, where you will be greeted by the tour leader. After a briefing, you will get to ride through the historical walled streets of Jaipur and meet sculptors, artisans and other locals along the way. 

 

A laughing yoga activity at Govind Dev Ji Temple with the locals is the highlight of the tour. You will also get to visit the beautiful markets close by and taste famous delicacies at multiple food joints. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

INCLUSIONS:
Bottled Mineral water.
Food samplings at various famous food joints of Jaipur.
Brand new geared bicycles with high-quality helmets for added safety.
Well experienced bicycle tour leaders who are well versed in the route.
There will be a trained bicycle mechanic cum tour escort following all the riders throughout the tour.

 

TERMS & CONDITIONS:
Booking is subject to availability.


Minimum 2 persons are required to confirm the booking.
Please note: Transfers from the hotel to the start and endpoint is not included in the above cost.

data.title: Pedal To The Sunrise Point At Nahargarh
data.shortDescription:
This cycling expedition involves a ride to the highest point in the city. Breathing fresh mountain air and catching the rising sun amidst the Aravalis around Jaipur is an experience in itself. Riding to the Nahargarh fort through jungles is a little challenging, but also rewarding.

 

The journey starts at 6 am in the heart of the walled city of Jaipur, however, there are multiple halts along the way at iconic heritage buildings. This cobbled route to the fort used to be the pathway for elephants and horses back in the day. Once you reach the summit, you will be able to see the blissful sunrise and a majestic view of the Mann Sagar lake. Thereafter, you will visit a nearby temple, walk through the Nahargarh stepwell and ride back to the city to relish some delicious snacks. 

 

The trip also includes a visit to the old Havelis (mansions) to get to know about its significance and architecture. 

 

Free Cancellation

 

INCLUSION:
Bottled Mineral water.
Food samplings at various famous food joints of Jaipur.
Brand new geared bicycles with high-quality helmets for added safety.
Well experienced bicycle tour leaders who are well versed in the route.
There will be a trained bicycle mechanic cum tour escort following all the riders throughout the tour.
A short walk on the rampart wall of Nahargarh.

 

EXCLUSION:
Booking is subject to availability.


Minimum 2 persons are required to confirm the booking.
Please note: Transfers from hotel to the start and endpoint is not included in the tour cost.
